categories.title: Dogs
categories.description: Loyal and friendly companions perfect for families

categories.title: Birds
categories.description: Colorful and melodious friends that brighten any home

animals.name: Golden Retriever
animals.description: Friendly, intelligent, and devoted dogs. Great family pets that love children and are highly trainable. These beautiful golden companions bring joy and loyalty to every household.

animals.name: German Shepherd
animals.description: Beautiful singing birds that bring joy to any home. Easy to care for and delightful companions. Their melodious songs create a peaceful atmosphere.

animals.name: Siamese Cat
animals.description: Low-maintenance pets perfect for beginners. Beautiful and peaceful aquatic companions that provide a calming presence in any space.
